title: Kennedy Retires; GOP Attacks Russia Probe: A Closer Look | Stacey Abrams
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans rushing to replace retiring Supreme Court Justice Anthony Kennedy while simultaneously working to stop the Russia investigation.

Then, Stacey Abrams talks about her unique campaign strategy for the governorship of Georgia, how she relates to voters and her past as a romantic suspense novelist.

Abrams continues to talk backstage at Studio 8G.
